resources.string: - The player can Choose the level at the launch of the application. - The player can also give up at this phase and quit the game. - When the level is won, the app will suggest to move to the next level. - The user can navigate and return to levels already played - The user has only access to unlocked levels - It is possible to quit the game at any time thanks to « quit » button - The restart button is used to reset an active game . - The Joker button is used to reset the grid while keeping the score and the number of remaining moves (this will be useful in case No exchange is possible). - Item place exchanges are made by sliding the finger on the screen.Exchange is possible only vertically or horizontally - The exchange makes it possible to form a group of 3 identical items aligned vertically or horizontally. In the contrary case, the exchange is forbidden or must be canceled - If two (or more) groups are deleted at the same time, the score reported by the hit is the addition of scores reported by each group
